channel.title: Adding shops to a 562 source- AtomicScape-
channel.description: Basically the subject explains it... I need help adding shops to my server on the source, AtomicScape. I know how to spawn the shop keepers and add items to the shop but i have no idea how to code it so when you click trade, with the shopkeeper, it opens the shop. Please help... Thanks, ---Rayra3---

item.title: Adding shops to a 562 source- AtomicScape-

item.description:
@rayra wrote:

Basically the subject explains it… I need help adding shops to my server on the source, AtomicScape. I know how to spawn the shop keepers and add items to the shop but i have no idea how to code it so when you click trade, with the shopkeeper, it opens the shop. Please help…
Thanks,
—Rayra3—
